title: Amuls
author: Amuls
content: 1)English premier LeagueEverton Vs ChelseaTips: Chelsea Win or draw the match.Odds: 1.46 2) Spain La LigaBarcelona Vs GironaTips: Barcelona win the matchOdds: 1.58❤️ Best of luck ❤️

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: A quick question to you. Can you sustain this thread with the prediction that you have started. The sustainability is what matters if you are looking at a long time update.Or what is your intention for it, you want to introduce something else to it on a later time?You could rather merge it up with some of the existing threads. We have both leagues prediction threads already.

comments.author: Amuls
comments.body: I will stay here long time....

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Besides suggesting two of the major teams that will play during this round did you feel there Is any valido reason or data that bring you to make this suggestions?Stake! What stake you suggest to play? What percentuale of a portfolio in each bet?

comments.author: Amuls
comments.body: H2H in last 6 matches, Barcelona won 4 matches. 1 lost and 1 draw. Barcelona's last 6 matches, the team win 4 matches and never lossed home ground. Girona's recent performance well but mighty Barcelona far better in his home ground. I am damm sure about the Barcelona match. Chelsea  don't let me down....

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: Amuls on December 10, 2023, 04:16:48 AM1)English premier LeagueEverton Vs ChelseaTips: Chelsea Win or draw the match.Odds: 1.46 Well, this is a conservative bet devoid of greed. Other things being equal, it is a sure bet because Chelsea will not want to lose two matches at a stretch. However, Everton have not been doing badly in their current form, having defeated Newcastle 3:0 in their last match, an outcome no one saw coming. Giving Chelsea the advantage in this match is more of a psychological thing and not based on present realities. By this I mean that Chelsea might be more business minded, knowing the psychological damage they will incur losing to Everton after losing previous match to Manchester United. They will also be disappointing their fans I no mean way should they allow Everton defeat them even though they are away. Therefore, I will give Chelsea the upper hands in this match and hope there are not surprises.

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: Quote from: Amuls on December 10, 2023, 04:16:48 AM1)English premier LeagueEverton Vs ChelseaTips: Chelsea Win or draw the match.Odds: 1.46 2) Spain La LigaBarcelona Vs GironaTips: Barcelona win the matchOdds: 1.58❤️ Best of luck ❤️We all know there's no sure game prediction no matter from whom it's coming from except the match officials who fix the match  , nevertheless, op your bet prediction is okay for gambler who's not greedy and also have a good bankroll to shoot his shot big. But am concerned like one of the first commenter above, do you have interest and intentions on sustaining this thread with consistent predictions? Or it's just a one time thing that you are doing?Please give us a reply so we can follow on with you in thread if you intent is to keep the predictions rolling.

comments.author: FinePoine0
comments.body: Quote from: Odohu on December 10, 2023, 07:41:25 AMQuote from: Amuls on December 10, 2023, 04:16:48 AM1)English premier LeagueEverton Vs ChelseaTips: Chelsea Win or draw the match.Odds: 1.46 Well, this is a conservative bet devoid of greed. Other things being equal, it is a sure bet because Chelsea will not want to lose two matches at a stretch. However, Everton have not been doing badly in their current form, having defeated Newcastle 3:0 in their last match, an outcome no one saw coming. Giving Chelsea the advantage in this match is more of a psychological thing and not based on present realities. By this I mean that Chelsea might be more business minded, knowing the psychological damage they will incur losing to Everton after losing previous match to Manchester United. They will also be disappointing their fans I no mean way should they allow Everton defeat them even though they are away. Therefore, I will give Chelsea the upper hands in this match and hope there are not surprises. Everton have performed very well this season. As Chelsea is a strong team, the visitors will surely enjoy a nice competitive game today. Dominic Calvert is very good and experienced player of Everton team who scores goals with very strong powerful kicks. And meanwhile Nicolas Jackson is in the Chelsea team as he scores in most of the matches. With such players in the team, the audience will definitely enjoy a competitive game. But today I will bet for Chelsea team because I think Chelsea team is definitely the best this season.

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: OP there is no need creating a new thread for the predictions of this matches because there are several threads where people’s opinions regarding match predictions are discussed so kindly lock up this thread and make predictions on the appropriate thread. You have been around for a while and you have even made some replies on the La liga prediction thread so you must be aware of similar predictions threads already. If everyone was to create a new thread for every match then the gambling discussion board must have been over flooded by now so it’s good to keep the board clean and not make irrelevant threads that will flood the board.

comments.author: Hirose UK
comments.body: Every gambler has their own predictions with various analysis methods carried out and every gambler is definitely more confident in what they have to bet on.But that doesn't mean that the predictions you provide are useless because by providing predictions here you can make considerations and references for everyone who wants to bet.Quote from: Amuls on December 10, 2023, 04:16:48 AM1)English premier LeagueEverton Vs ChelseaTips: Chelsea Win or draw the match.Odds: 1.46 But I think Everton has chance to win in the match which will be played soon.Firstly, this is home match for Everton and secondly, Everton has better quality of play and has the advantage of winning more than Chelsea even though it is only 1 win difference.Quote2) Spain La LigaBarcelona Vs GironaTips: Barcelona win the matchOdds: 1.58This is difficult match but I will not say or agree that Barcelona will win but draw can still be considered as betting reference.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Amuls on December 10, 2023, 04:52:28 AMI will stay here long time....It just kind of wired to me to open a thread just to predict just Barcelona's performance and possible results,  even though we are all aware of how improved Barcelona has been in the season,  and we can't say if this current performance was a carryover from the last season and if Barcelona will be able to sustain its current trend in winning till the end of the season.  Because both in the La Liga and the Champions League,  Barcelona is booked to be facing some other stronger clubs that may make Barcelona's efforts look very minimal at the next stage,  but then also we may not be able or right to totally say so and for that we need to wait and see how the remaining time of the season goes for the club.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Quote from: Wiwo on December 10, 2023, 04:30:59 PMQuote from: Amuls on December 10, 2023, 04:52:28 AMI will stay here long time....It just kind of wired to me to open a thread just to predict just Barcelona's performance and possible results,  even though we are all aware of how improved Barcelona has been in the season,  and we can't say if this current performance was a carryover from the last season and if Barcelona will be able to sustain its current trend in winning till the end of the season.  Because both in the La Liga and the Champions League,  Barcelona is booked to be facing some other stronger clubs that may make Barcelona's efforts look very minimal at the next stage,  but then also we may not be able or right to totally say so and for that we need to wait and see how the remaining time of the season goes for the club. So this is just picking the bookmaker's favorite. It's not so bad to pick the winning teams after all bookies provide hints all the time. And that's what he reasoned above.But we shall see, threads like this are appreciated though. I could have done this myself as I have done it before but I am no expert in this sport, I'm just gonna bet a small amount on the suggested teams. Hope he is going to keep the thread active. Keep the fun rolling, we'll see how far the thread will go.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: well, chelsea lost in the game against everton, your prediction failed, but it's not something unusual because chelsea hasn't been doing well for a few years and even when they change coaches they continue to perform poorly, it seems to me that chelsea's problem will be resolved so early, even though they have money, the coaches who work for Chelsea have not been able to make good hires, they are the same as Manchester United, while Everton is improving a lot, in the last 3 games Everton has had victories and has not lost in any game and in the last 5 games Everton had only 1 defeat and they are already leaving the relegation zone, if Everton continues like this then they will be able to stay very far from the relegation zoneabout your prediction of the barcelona game against girona. This is a game that for Barcelona to win, they will need to have a very strong defense, Girona has conceded goals in many games, so in my opinion they have a very weak defense, but Girona has managed to score goals in every game they have. done and barcelona has managed to come out of games without conceding a goal, which shows that barcelona has an acceptable defense, so I see barcelona coming out with victory in this game, I have the same opinion as you in relation to this game between barcelona and the Girona

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Everton won against Chelsea today defying many odds and continuing the thing from the yesterday games,making quite some surprise results for the Premier League during this weekend.Barcelona of course in theory should win but anything can happen as Girona is not there by chance,many weeks have passed and they are the leaders of La Liga so the game isn't going to be as easy as the bookies predict.In most of the time bookies try to deceive us with their odds,out of 100 odds 70 are to deceive us and only 30 come as predicted,the people who know how to read odds are some what successful in sport betting.
